titles.title: St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission Act of 2007
St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission Act of 2007
To establish the St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

bill.summary: St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission Act of 2007 - Establishes the St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission to plan and execute programs and activities to commemorate the 450th anniversary of the founding of St. Augustine, Florida.
